Articles.Content:
Hey all, I own KSP on Steam, and I need a Windows 32bit version 1.0.2 instance to test something mod-related.

Unfortunately, Steam only downgrades to 0.90, and I only have an 1.0.0 instance and a 1.0.4 instance backed up.

Now I'm looking for a way to get my hands on the missing intermediate, ideally without downloading some dubious torrent from a dubious website. I can prove that I do in fact own the game if necessary, with my Steam ID, where you can see the game in my library. I can chat you up to prove that I own this profile.

Now that that's out of the way, what would be my best option to go about this?

Sorry Streetwind but the 1.0.2 is no longer available.

Closing.
